    Please help me document your indicator

    A public sample dataset

    ecoinvent_activities_demo.Rd

    Public based on a meeting on 2023-03-22

    Usage

    ecoinvent_activities_demo

    Format

    An object of class tbl_df (inherits from tbl, data.frame) with 20 rows and 16 columns.

    Source

    Tilman via https://github.com/2DegreesInvesting/tiltData/issues/200

    Examples

    ecoinvent_activities_demo
